tool_description: Unlock the potential of your videos with Video Text API. Seamlessly integrate dynamic and compelling text content into your TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and more. Access an extensive collection of categories such as Girls Fact, Love and Relationships, and beyond, empowering you to enhance your storytelling and engage your audience like never before. Elevate your videos to new heights with Video Text API and let your content speak volumes.
name: Video Text
title: Video Text

api_list.name: Category
api_list.description:
By providing the category parameter in the query string of a GET request to this endpoint, you will receive a JSON response containing randomly selected text from the specified category. The textincludes the following information:

category: The category of the quote.
first_part: The first part or line of the quote.
second_part: The second part or continuation of the quote.
Example categories:
Girls Fact
Male Fact
Love and Relationships
Heartbreak
Well-being
Leadership

api_list.name: Random
api_list.description: Retrieve a random quote from the database. Each request returns a JSON response with a randomly selected quote, including the category, first part, and second part.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://video-text1.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-text1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://video-text1.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-text1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
